title: Rational construction of luminescent Eu-doped Y-MOF for ratiometric temperature sensing
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28340-28344
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05796A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wei Wei, Xi Li, Yong-Ya Zhang, Jian-Wei Zhang
A dual-emitter luminescent Eu-doped Y-MOF was successfully constructed by using a cation exchange strategy. As a self-calibrated thermometer, this Eu-doped MOF exhibits excellent fluorescence performance for wide-range temperature sensing.
